trans-unit.source: Represents a key that is used to identify localizable resources in a <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary"></xref>.
This class represents a key that can uniquely identify a localizable value inside [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_baml](~/includes/tlasharptla-baml-md.md)].
It represents a combination of a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResourceKey.Uid%2A>, class name, and property name.

The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResourceKey.Uid%2A> value must be added to the source [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] file either by using the `updateuid` [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_msbuild](~/includes/tlasharptla-msbuild-md.md)] target (for example, `msbuild /t:updateuid myproj.proj`), or manually in the markup.
[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] without a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResourceKey.Uid%2A> cannot be localized.
The class name is the type name of the element that contains the localizable property.
The property name refers to the property that has the localizable value.
A special property called "`$Content`" is used to represent values that are the initialization text or content property of an element.
For example the `$Content` property name would apply to the initialization text `Click` in the following XAML:
XAML Text Usage
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResourceKey"></xref> class with the supplied Uid, class name, and property name.
The Uid of an element that has a localizable resource.
The class name of a localizable resource in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_baml](~/includes/tlasharptla-baml-md.md)].
The property name of a localizable resource in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)].
Gets the name of the assembly that defines the type of the localizable resource as declared by its <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResourceKey.ClassName"></xref>.
The assembly name is not required to uniquely identify a resource in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] but is included here as a convenience.
The name of the assembly.
Gets the class name component of this <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResourceKey"></xref>.
The class name component of this <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResourceKey"></xref>.
Compares an object to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResourceKey"></xref> for equality.
The object to compare for equality.
`true` if the two instances are equal; otherwise, `false`.
Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResourceKey"></xref> for equality.
The other instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResourceKey"></xref> to compare for equality.
`true` if the two instances are equal; otherwise, `false`.
Returns an integer hash code representing this instance.
An integer hash code.
Gets the property name component of this <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResourceKey"></xref>.
The property name component of this <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResourceKey"></xref>.
Gets the Uid component of this <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResourceKey"></xref>.
The Uid component of this <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResourceKey"></xref>.
